lead_paragraph: Jim Herman played in the group in front of Tiger Woods last week on the PGA Tour, giving him a little experience in coping with gallery noise behind him. Sunday at The Barclays was slightly different. It wasn't the size of the gallery, it was one person.

headline.main: Trump Makes an Appearance at Barclays
headline.print_headline: Trump Makes an Appearance at Barclays
